full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement EZ899-250038: Structural Inspection and Evaluation Services 2024 and 2025**
==========================================================

**Overview**
------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to participate in a competitive tender for EZ899-250038 Structural Inspection and Evaluation Services 2024 and 2025. The contract aims to provide structural inspection and evaluation services for government infrastructure projects in British Columbia.

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: The bid will be evaluated based on a combination of Technical Merit and Price.
*   **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other trade agreements.

**Contract Details**
---------------------

*   **Contract Duration**: 1 July 2024 to 31 March 2026
*   **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 15 July 2024

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba discovery platform. The tender closing date is 3 July 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For any questions or clarification regarding this tender, please contact Donna Fung at donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documentation**
-------------------------

The tender package, including all necessary documentation, can be accessed by following the link to the Ariba discovery platform:

<https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19914293?extsite=MTk5MTQyOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

We greatly appreciate your interest in this tender opportunity.
